menu.description: A crunchy French-style baguette stuffed with combination of meat, vegestables and other condiments.
A savory mixture of ground pork, chicken and mixed vegetable, grassnoodle wrapped in rice paper and fried until golden brown. Served with home made sauce.

<pre>Filled with shrimp, pork, carrot, shredded lettuce, vermicelli and mint then wrapperd into a softened rice paper. Serve with peanut dipping sauce or fish sauce.
Choice of shrimp and pork, shrimp only, grilled beef, grilled chicken, grilled pork, shredded pork skin or tofu.
Grilled pork patties or pork ball rolled in rice paper with variety of greens and herbs. Served with our special dipping plum sauce.
Shredded crab meat flavored cream cheese and onion.
A traditional mixture of shrimp, pork, bean sprouts and dedicate sauce folded into a rice powder pancake served with lettuce, sweet basil and cucumber.
Rice Vermicelli with grilled meats, shredded lettuce, mint, beansprout, cucumber, scallion and fresh roasted peanut. Served with homemade fish sauce.

menu.description:
Our famous Vietnamese soups with scallions, onion and cilantro. Served with a plate of beansprouts, fresh basil, sliced lime and Jalape√±o on the side.
** Please note that a side order of beef balls can be added to any of the below soups for $1.50 **
*** Consuming raw or uncooked meat, poultry, seafood, shellfish or egg may increase your risk of foodborne illness. ***
An extra large bowl beef noodle soup. A bowl of our most popular beef noodle soup combing with rare steak, well-done brisket, flank, tendon, and tripe.
An large bowl beef noodle soup. A bowl of our most popular beef noodle soup combing with rare steak, well-done brisket, flank, tendon, and tripe.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with a combination of rare steak, well-done flank, tendon, and tripe.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with a combination of rare steak, well-done tendon and tripe.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with rare steak.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with rare steak and tendon.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with rare steak and well-done brisket.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with rare steak and tripe.
A large bowl of beef noodle soup with rare steak and well-done flank.
A large bowl of beef ball noodle soup.
A large bowl of chicken noodle soup with shredded chicken served with clear chicken broth or beef broth.
A large bowl of clear noodle or rice noodle soup topped with shrimp, crabmeat, pork heart, pork liver and sliced pork in clear chicken broth.
A large bowl of seafood noodle soup topped with shrimp, squid and scallop with choice of yellow or rice noodles.
Spicy Hue style noodle soup with lemongrass beef broth, sliced beef, and pig's trotter
A large bow of beef stew soup with beef and carrots with choice of rice noodle or bread on the side.
A large bow of crab noodle soup with vermicelli, crabmeat, fish cake and tomato.
A large bow of angovy noodle soup with vermicelli, fish, shrimp, crabmeat, and fish cake.
A large bow of chicken curry soup with chicken, and taro with choice of vermicelli or bread on the side.
** Any Extra Sauce for $0.50
A white rice plate with pork chop, shredded pork skin, and pork cake.
A white rice plate with pork chop, and deep-fried shrimp paste wrapped in bean curd skin.

A stir-fried rice plate with shrimp, chicken, egg, onion, tomatos, carrots, green peas and scallion in special sauce.
A stir-fried rice plate with shrimp, squid, scallip, egg and mixed vegestables.
The most famous Thai nooodle stir-fried with shrimp, chicken, egg, bean sprouts and scallion topped with ground peanuts.
An authentic spicy version of Pad Thai with chicken, shrimp, bean sprouts, scallion, egg topped with ground peanuts and spice.
A stir-ried flat rice noodles with chicken, thai chilli sauce, basil leaves and vegestables with a choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
A stir-fried with flat rice noodles, egg, broccoli and carrots in dark brown sauce with a choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
A stir-fried egg noodles with a choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
A stir-fried rice noodles with a choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
